document.title: Long Range Master Plan
document.abstract: This master plan is intended as a guide for future capital improvements on the campus of The University of Tennessee, Knoxville (UTK) and on the Knoxville campus of The University of Tennessee Institute of Agriculture (UTIA). The outlying units and UT Medical Center are no longer a part of the Campus Master Plan study area. A separate master plan for the Cherokee Campus, a research-based installation in Knoxville, was developed by Gresham, Smith and Partners in 2009.
